text: Julie Ann Strain (February 18, 1962 – January 10, 2021) was an American actress and model. She was Penthouse Pet of the Month in June 1991. In movies, she appeared in Naked Gun 33⅓: The Final Insult and Beverly Hills Cop III. From 1998 through 2001, she hosted Sex Court. She was born in Concord, California. In November 2018, Strain announced that she had advanced dementia and was placed in hospice care. She died from the disease on January 10, 2021 at the age of 58.RIP Julie Strain: B-Movie Actor And Star Of 'Heavy Metal 2000' ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television presenters Category:Models from California Category:American pornographic actors Category:Actors from California Category:People from Concord, California
title: Julie Strain
